long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatCap is a handy tool for developers working with GPT-4. It keeps track of the number of requests sent to GPT-4 within a specified time window, helping you manage your usage and avoid exceeding your quota, all while enjoying a seamless UI/UX experience!

Features:

1) Tracks the number of requests sent to GPT-4.
2) Resets the request count after a specified time window (default is 3 hours).
3) Provides a seamless UI/UX experience by integrating smoothly with the ChatGPT interface.
